text: Tatiana Idonea (19 April 1924 â€“ 31 January 2022), better known by the stage name of Tatiana Farnese, was an Italian actress. She was born in Rome, Italy. Her best known roles were in Schoolgirl Diary (1941), A Garibaldian in the Convent (1942), The Gorgon (1942), The Mad Marechiaro (1952), Your Whole Life Ahead of You (2008) and Three Days Later (2013). Farnese died in Rome on 31 January 2022, at the age of 97. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Actors from Rome
title: Tatiana Farnese
